    Xiaotao Hu

    Nankai University

    • lfl.
    • Tianjin, China
    • Email
    • Github
    • Google Scholar

    I am a master student of TMCC, College of Computer Science, Nankai University, under the supervision of Prof. Ming-Ming Cheng. I am also an intern in Light Illusions, supervised by Prof. Ping Tan. I received my B.E. degrees at the Dalian University of Technology (DLUT) in 2021. My research interest includes computer vision and computer graphics.
